description:
This market refers to the Counter-Strike match between QUAZAR and VP.Prodigy in the CCT Europe Closed Qualifier: Series #15 Group B, scheduled for February 6 at 7:20AM ET.

This market will resolve to "QUAZAR" if QUAZAR wins 2 or more maps than VP.Prodigy in this match.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "VP.Prodigy".

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.

events.description:
This market refers to the Counter-Strike match between QUAZAR and VP.Prodigy in the CCT Europe Series #15 Play-In Group B, scheduled for February 6 at 7:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "QUAZAR" if QUAZAR win the match against VP.Prodigy.

This market will resolve to "VP.Prodigy" if VP.Prodigy win the match against QUAZAR.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to the team who wins. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50. 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://hltv.org/.
events.title: Counter-Strike: QUAZAR vs VP.Prodigy (BO3) - CCT Europe Series #15 Play-In Group B

question: Map Handicap: QUA (-1.5) vs VP.Prodigy (+1.5)
